name: SUMI WORLD
description:
Welcome to SUMI WORLD!

Sumi World is a fun virtual world with definetly real people in them! You can walk around, chat with buddies, and even dance! There are 4 rooms in total, each with various users wandering around and doing activities.

To chat, click on yourself. To change rooms, click on the Next Room button (on the bottom left). To dance, click on the Action button (on the bottom right).

(This is only a simulation. There isn't any actual online elements in this, and everyone is just coded A.I.)

CREDITS:

Miga, Quatchi, Sumi and Mukmuk are owned by the International Olympic Committee and were designed by Meomi.

Text-to-speech voices provided by lazypy.ro, Uberduck and Microsoft Sam.

Reese's Puffs and the Reese's Puffs rap are owned by General Mills.

The Dreamcast and Dreamcast sounds are owned by SEGA.

ROBLOX and the ROBLOX boombox are owned by the Roblox Corporation.

Wow! Wow! Wubbzy is owned by Starz Media, Bolder Media, Nick Jr. and Bob Boyle.
